altername_name: Tenract II: The Evil Is Back Again
name: Tenract 2: The Evil is Back Again
overview: A multi-scrolling Shoot'em Up created by Wolfgang Strasser (with great music by Thomas Detert) in the vein of Netherworld and published in Magic Disk 64 1993/09. Dark corridors, nasty monsters and lots of treasures. "Tenrakt 2" offers everything an adventurer's heart desires. On the far left is the number of lives, next to it the number of smart bombs, next to it the number of energy cells to be collected in the respective level and finally the score display. The hero's energy is also shown on the right, and a position further to the left is a direction indicator that shows the closest energy cell. Extras: L - extra life P - PowerUp B - smart bomb S - protective shield * - SpeedUp
